planet.name: Wolf 359 b
GJ 406 b
planet.description: Wolf 359 is the fifth closest star to the Sun. It is a young, low mass M-dwarf star and might host a yet unconfirmed planetary system. The Wolf 359 star system was featured in the Star Trek: The Next Generation episode The Best of Both Worlds.
